message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a product that will be incredibly valuable to your business.  I've assessed its worth to you at $1,500,000, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  To make this a mutually beneficial deal, I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,200,000.  This represents a significant savings for you and allows me to achieve a fair return on my investment.  I believe this is a win-win proposition, and I'm eager to discuss this further with you. Let me know if you'd like to schedule a call to finalize the details.
